title: My League wont open?
body:
FIXED

Seems like I'm not the only one. 
I click my desktop icon and the League logo comes up like it normally does but once it goes away nothing else happened. Help? 
Thanks!

replies.body: Your client failing to appear can happen if a security setting blocks it from launching.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get it going.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=s9Qkh4RT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-06T22:44:49.768+0000)
>
> Your client failing to appear can happen if a security setting blocks it from launching.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get it going.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I ended up restarting my computer and it worked after!
Thanks for replying though!
